name: The Unknown Road
description:
The Unknown Road is a first person PSX style horror game made for the 2021 Global Game Jam, created by 7 Ontario Tech University Game Development students.

PC/Controller Controls

WASD/Left Stick - to Move

Space/A Button - Jump

Mouse/Right Stick - to Look

E/X Button - to Interact 

Left Mouse Button/RT Button - Drop Items

Demo Info
  • Download the zip file
  • Unzip it
  • Double click on the .exe
Credits

Gil Robern  - Game/Sound Design

Eashvar Balachandran - Gameplay Programming

Ricky Caceres - Game/Sound Design

Lillian Fan - Lead Programmer

Adam Bilyea - 3D Art and Texturing

Rowan Luckhurst - 3D Character Design

Safa Nazir - UI Design and 3D Art
